explains: adj. 整年的；一年到头的

sentences.en: They work 7 days a week year-round.
sentences.cn: 一年到头他们每周工作7天。

sentences.en: Cuba has a tropical climate with year-round sunshine.
sentences.cn: 古巴属于热带气候，终年阳光明媚。

sentences.en: Tours are arranged all year round (January excepted).
sentences.cn: 全年都提供观光旅游（一月份除外）。
